dice

Class PairOfDice

  • java.lang.Object
    • dice.PairOfDice

  • public class PairOfDice
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents two die that will be used to play the game of Pig
    Author:
    Nathan Ray

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Die dieOne 
      private Die dieTwo 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PairOfDice()
      Initializes both of the die to one, by calling on the Die constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getFaceValue1()
      Returns the value of the face of dieOne
      int getFaceValue2()
      Returns the value of the face of dieTwo
      int getTotalValue()
      Returns the total value of both of the die
      void roll()
      Rolls both of the die, using the roll method from the Die class
      void setDie(int die, int value)
      Sets a chosen die to a specified value, printing an error message if the die value or face value is not within normal range
